title: Spider's Castle White Silk
description: One day, the spider Metallica wouldnâ€™t eat any of its meal of flesh and blood. Delegated by her senpai, Machala has to clean up after Matallica in addition to making sure it eats, even if it means her death. Will Metallica eat their food? Will Machala come back in one piece?
author: Kouhei Shibata
